itemDisplayName: Create an IoT Hub Device Provisioning Service
description: This template enables you to create an IoT hub and an IoT Hub Device Provisioning Service, and link the two services together.
summary: This template creates an IoT hub and an IoT Hub Device Provisioning Service, and link the two services together.
